geminitranslator-ca-translate: Label for the sidebar/menu action link that triggers the translation dialog.
geminitranslator-ui-translating: Message displayed while the translation process is running.
geminitranslator-ui-translated: Message displayed (e.g., in a banner) after content has been translated.
geminitranslator-ui-error: Generic error message displayed to the user if translation fails.
geminitranslator-ui-original: Link or button text to revert the translation to the original source.
geminitranslator-error-no-api-key: Backend error message when the extension cannot find the API key.
geminitranslator-error-bad-response: Backend error message when the API response format is unexpected.
